description: This capstone course provides students with an opportunity to reflect on the content and self-knowledge built up in the core courses of the Leadership major, and to develop a program for their future development as a leader. It comprises two components: fortnightly reflections on a set of readings and a negotiated research project throughout the semester. The interactions are designed to be collegial and dialogic, directed towards developing a credible leadership path for each student.
restricted:
Quota: class size 20-40 students. 
Final course in field of study.
